rules.text:
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
色情或暴力的媒體在發布時必須標明為敏感媒體

No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
沒有種族主義、性別歧視、同性戀恐懼癥、變性恐懼癥、仇外心理或種姓歧視

No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
不煽動暴力或宣傳暴力意識形態

No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
不騷擾、不打壓、不挖苦其他用戶

Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
不要分享故意的虛假或誤導性的信息

records.text: Why are full-body checkups important?Many health conditions, like diabetes, high blood pressure, or even some cancers, often develop silently in the initial stages. A comprehensive full-body checkup acts as a preventive measure, offering a comprehensive snapshot of your overall health. Here’s why it matters:Early Detection: These checkups can detect hidden health concerns early, allowing for prompt intervention and treatment. This can significantly improve the success rate of treatment and your overall health outcomes.Health Monitoring: Regular checkups allow us to track changes in your health parameters over time. This helps identify trends and potential risk factors for future problems.Peace of Mind: Knowing you’ve taken a proactive step towards maintaining your health can bring immense peace of mind. It allows you to focus on living a healthy life without constant worry.Read here - https://t.ly/Y-R8-

records.text: Why are full-body checkups important?Many health conditions, like diabetes, high blood pressure, or even some cancers, often develop silently in the initial stages. A comprehensive full-body checkup acts as a preventive measure, offering a comprehensive snapshot of your overall health. Here’s why it matters:Early Detection: These checkups can detect hidden health concerns early, allowing for prompt intervention and treatment. This can significantly improve the success rate of treatment and your overall health outcomes.Health Monitoring: Regular checkups allow us to track changes in your health parameters over time. This helps identify trends and potential risk factors for future problems.Peace of Mind: Knowing you’ve taken a proactive step towards maintaining your health can bring immense peace of mind. It allows you to focus on living a healthy life without constant worry.Read here - https://t.ly/Y-R8-

records.text: Why are full-body checkups important?Many health conditions, like diabetes, high blood pressure, or even some cancers, often develop silently in the initial stages. A comprehensive full-body checkup acts as a preventive measure, offering a comprehensive snapshot of your overall health. Here’s why it matters:Early Detection: These checkups can detect hidden health concerns early, allowing for prompt intervention and treatment. This can significantly improve the success rate of treatment and your overall health outcomes.Health Monitoring: Regular checkups allow us to track changes in your health parameters over time. This helps identify trends and potential risk factors for future problems.Peace of Mind: Knowing you’ve taken a proactive step towards maintaining your health can bring immense peace of mind. It allows you to focus on living a healthy life without constant worry.Read here - https://t.ly/Y-R8-
